name: Countdown
0:
”Alexa, start countdown”
”Alexa, tell countdown to start from 5”
”Alexa, tell countdown to start from 100”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: count down
des:
Make counting down a part of your life with the Countdown skill! Alexa will expertly count down to zero from lots of different numbers, just ask!

Countdowns are perfect for many games and occasions, including:
* Starting races
* Jumping into pools
* Rocket launches
* Surprise parties
* New Year's Eve
* Defusing bombs
* Parenting
